mapper.select: SELECT product.pid, product_name_kor, product_name_eng, product_id, category_id, gender_id, brand.brand_name AS brand_name, released_price, created_at, product_likes, product_bookmark, GROUP_CONCAT(product_img.img_file) AS img_file FROM product INNER JOIN product_img ON product.pid = product_img.pid_number INNER JOIN brand ON product.brand_id = brand.brand_id WHERE product.pid = #{pid} GROUP BY product.pid;
